attributes.action: pass law on ex forces housing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Military life in recent years has become more stressed, many servicemen and women will leave the forces through end of term,illness/injury or loss of a loved one,or through marital breakdown.
 Councils and Housing Associations should give priority to ex service personnel or their families. They should not be made to wait in homeless units and hostels or temporary accomadation. Any ruling should apply to single persons as well as service personnel with families or thier spouses
....This Petition is on behalf of Parcels43 Supporting Our Troops

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
